column1: Smoque BBQ////Went here for the second time.   No frills decor.  Didn't have to wait in line very long.  Ordered sliced
column3: babyback ribs and fries.  Food is promptly prepared
column4: but  not "fast-food".  The sauce has a smoky quality to it and isn't a tomato-based or sweet sauce.  The rib meat falls off the bone.
